#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    
    cin >> t;
    
    while(t-- > 0)
    {
        int N;
        cin >> N;
        
        int Ar[N];
        
        for(int i = 0;i < N;i++)
        {
            cin >> Ar[i];
            Ar[i] *= 3;
        }
        
        int inp;
        int Max = 0;
        
        for(int i = 0;i < N;i++)
        {
            cin >> inp;
            Ar[i] += inp;
            
            if(Ar[i] > Max)
            {
                Max = Ar[i];
            }
        }
        
        cout << Max << endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
